::Striker/Prowl::

Striker looks at Ratchet, nodding. "Allright. Do you think we should repair 
this one or melt it down or start over?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl reluctantly turns away from Iron Raptor to look at Arcangel, his eyes 
lighting up.

"That's brilliant!" the feathered Maximal exclaims (thanx for that nick-name, 
Carnage), "We could put repair drones to work on it untill there are no bots 
on the planet, then program it to crash into its spot!"

Prowl frowns. "But does Brooder have enough resources to put a ship that size 
into space?"
